name: Call me a Gangsta
description:
Call Me A Gangsta No Wanksta
Rolling Down The Streets Fear No Danger
Ain’t Got No Time For The Haters
Hitting Big Scores Makin’ Papers

Execute epic heists, build your underground empire and become the notorious cold-blooded criminal in the city rife with corruption and ruthlessness right here in ~ Call Me A Gangsta ~ !

Your thug life in Call Me A Gangsta is composed of:
Money Money Money
It’s a rich man's world. You’ll have money flooding into your account stress-free, even if you’re AFK! And there are no restrictions stopping you from hustling! Customize cars, Get Rich or Die Trying!

Forming Badass Crews
Recruit cruel hitmen, black hat hackers, getaway drivers and crime scene cleaners. Train them, exceed their limits, and kill every game at ease with your elite squad!

Occupying New Territories
South side to the North, East Coast to West Coast, takeover big and small properties across the entire country and stake your authority in the Empire of Crime!

Building Your Empire of Crime
Run legal businesses in shade, launder dirty money in the hood and bribe the Officials to keep the cops off your tails. Get things rolling and get some dough! The Empire of Crime needs YOU!

Hitting On Hot Babes
Take your flirting skills with Hot Babes to the next level! Meet lots of Sexy Bodies and Souls and know them INSIDE and OUT ! Protect your Babes from gang fights with bodyguards so they can serve you better! Your Babes are waiting!

Download Call Me A Gangsta and start living your Gangsta Legend NOW!

PLEASE NOTE
Network connection is required.
Call Me A Gangsta is free to download and Play. Some in-app items can also be purchased for real money. In-App Purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Follow us on Facebook for updates, rewarding events and more!
https://www.facebook.com/CallMeAGangstaGame
